product_data_model.description: The name or title of the product
product_data_model.name: title

product_data_model.name: manufacturer

product_data_model.description: A detailed overview of the product features or characteristics
product_data_model.name: description

product_data_model.description: Base price of the product with price unit (e.g., per kilogram)
product_data_model.name: base_price

product_data_model.description: The selling price of the product including any additional info such as quantity discount
product_data_model.name: price

product_data_model.description: Supplementary pricing information, including taxes or shipping
product_data_model.name: price_info

product_data_model.description: Reference price unit for cost estimation (e.g., per kilogram)
product_data_model.name: price_unit_reference

product_data_model.description: Estimated delivery time in days or specified duration
product_data_model.name: delivery_time

product_data_model.description: Growing altitude for coffee or similar products
product_data_model.name: altitude

product_data_model.description: The height at which the product (e.g., coffee) is grown
product_data_model.name: height

product_data_model.description: List of producers involved in creating the product
product_data_model.name: producers

product_data_model.description: Process method used for product preparation, especially in coffee production
product_data_model.name: process

product_data_model.description: Country or region of origin of the product
product_data_model.name: origin

product_data_model.description: Variety of product such as plant species or types
product_data_model.name: variety

product_data_model.name: varietal

product_data_model.name: taste_notes

product_data_model.description: An extended description encompassing detailed product characteristics and background
product_data_model.name: detailed_description

product_data_model.description: Additional information about the product's producer or manufacturer
product_data_model.name: producer_info

product_data_model.description: Introductory description providing a brief overview of the product
product_data_model.name: intro_description

product_data_model.description: Insightful information regarding the producer, providing background and credibility
product_data_model.name: meet_the_producer

product_data_model.description: Alternative description providing background and credibility about the producer
product_data_model.name: meet_the_producer_text

product_data_model.description: Introductory text to the product, often used for marketing purposes
product_data_model.name: intro

product_data_model.description: Details about what is included in the price
product_data_model.name: price_includes

product_data_model.description: Details on tax and shipping related to the product price
product_data_model.name: tax_and_shipping

product_data_model.description: General properties of the product in a descriptive format
product_data_model.name: properties
